name: Gagan Goyal
about: Gagan is a General Partner at India Quotient. He loves discussing technology disruptions‚Ä¶
recommendations: LinkedIn User ‚ÄúGagan is a born entrepreneur. His ability to empower employees to lead new Product development, try marketing ideas ( even if it's coming from engineering ) made for a fast pace learning environment for many of us. The one thing that stood out was his desire to not compromise on the user experience of the product. Of all the founders I worked for I learned the most from him and got equipped with the skill set needed to build and sell.‚Äù

Fred Rose ‚ÄúGagan is a very energetic and smart entrepreneur. His company, Robo.in, has developed a low cost robotics platform and associated training class, that has filled a big need in India. Robo.in has a very bright future‚Äù

volunteer_experience.info:
FIRST Global (www.first.global) - The Olympics of Robotics - A new initiative by Dean Kamen (Inventor of Segway and founder of FIRST) - to foster the interest and recognition of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) skills among young students. It's a Global championship that combines the excitement of sports with the rigourr of science and technology. The inaugural year event held in July 2017, Washington DC.I am voluntarily leading India's participation for FIRST‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          FIRST Global (www.first.global) - The Olympics of Robotics - A new initiative by Dean Kamen (Inventor of Segway and founder of FIRST) - to foster the interest and recognition of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) skills among young students. It's a Global championship that combines the excitement of sports with the rigourr of science and technology. The inaugural year event held in July 2017, Washington DC.I am voluntarily leading India's participation for FIRST GLOBAL for the last 5 years (2017- Washington, 2018 - Mexica, 2019 - Dubai, 2020 - Online, 2021 - Online), we have set up STEM EDUCATION TRUST - the objective is to identify young robotics enthusiasts, get them coached by domain experts, arrange funds and make sure India shine at Global Championship.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
